====== IATI Data Store ======
/* Please provide a brief description of the tool, and upload a screenshot if possible. Include details of the tool creator. */

The IATI Data Store was commissioned by the IATI Technical Secretariat to provide access to extracts of IATI data from across segmented files on the IATI Registry.

It provides CSV extracts of the data, and can stream large files in response to queries. 

===== Detailed Description =====
/* Provide additional details here */

The Data Store code imports IATI data into a Postgres SQL database, and provides an API layer on top of this. 

A version of the code will be deployed alongside the IATI Registry and kept updated with all available files.

It has been [[https://github.com/okfn/|developed by the Open Knowledge Foundation]].
